New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored his 19th T20I fifty.
India achieved its highest total of the tournament so far with 181 for eight.
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 7 runs.
The 60-run fifth-wicket stand between Suryakumar Yadav and Hardik Pandya was crucial.
Post-Match Reflections: Skipper Rohit Sharma will be pleased with the team’s performance.
A high standard for the rest of the tournament has been set.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India had no trouble adapting to conditions in the West Indies.
The move from USA to Barbados was seamless.
